```{r}
#|echo: false
#|message: false
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
#|echo: false
#|message: false
nyc_tracts<-read_csv("data/nyc_tracts.csv")
nyc_tracts|>drop_na()|>ggplot(aes(x=med_income))+geom_histogram()

nyc_tracts|>drop_na()|>ggplot(aes(x=med_income,y=race))+geom_point()

tract_counts <- nyc_tracts %>%
  count(borough) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))

ggplot(tract_counts, aes(x = reorder(borough, n), y = n, fill = borough)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(
    title = "Count of Census Tracts per Borough",
    x = "Borough",
    y = "Count",
    fill = "Borough"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
